body:
I'm not sure how to fix this, but it's very difficult to find a lot of stuff on readthedocs.

For example, as a quick way of finding information about the variant function, I will try to type 'variant' into the search bar on readthdocs. This however doesn't return very useful hits. At least not a definition of variant and how to use it.

The first hit is the spack packages API doc list and the only appearances of variant I can see is in reference to tests..

Anyway, I just wanted to start a discussion about this and see if anybody knew how to make this search function better. At this time I have no idea how to do it.
title: Search function on readthedocs is bad
